message: Successfully created 18 quiz questions for Week 9 (Intelligence) with comprehensive coverage

topics_covered: Cattell's fluid vs crystallized intelligence with application examples
Gender differences in IQ (spatial vs verbal, biological and environmental factors)
Racial IQ differences (Jensen, Bell Curve, APA task force, environmental consensus)
Flynn Effect (3 points/decade, fluid > crystallized, slowing in developed nations)
Heredity vs Environment (MZ twins reared apart, adoption studies)
